DOC.brief_summary: The purpose study determine significant safety issue identify follow single dose AMG 761 asthma subject would preclude development AMG 761 .
DOC.criteria: Healthy , history evidence clinically relevant medical psychiatric disorder ( exception asthma ) determine investigator consultation Amgen physician medically appropriate Immunizations date , minimum tetanus , diphtheria , pertussis ( td/Tdap ) , pneumococcal ( polysaccharide ) , influenza ( flu season ) H1N1 ( available ) vaccination , determine principal investigator Body mass index ( BMI ) range 18 35 kg/m2 , inclusive Is current nonsmoker use tobacco product within last 6 month cumulative smoke history must ≤ 10 pack year Clinically stable physician diagnosis asthma minimum 6 month prior enrollment , change asthma treatment least 3 month prior enrollment . As needed betaagonist use ( ie , PRN ) consider stable treatment Documented history atopy oak , mite , ragweed , timothy grass , Alternaria mold , kochia pollen , aspergillus , cottonwood within 18 month positive atopy skin prick test specific allergens screening period Additional inclusion criterion apply Past history serious skin rash require hospitalization Active , history ( within 12 month enrollment ) , acute viral infection skin ( eg , herpes simplex , herpes zoster , molluscum contagiosum ) Active history psoriasis , first degree relative active know history psoriasis First degree relative active history systemic lupus erythematosus type 1 diabetes , rheumatoid arthritis active autoimmune disorder , determine principal investigator History lifethreatening anaphylaxis Experienced asthma exacerbation ( defined disease episode result treatment emergency room , hospitalization , episode treat oral corticosteroid dosage least 5 mg/day prednisone equivalent ≥ 1 week ) 6 month prior enrollment Additional exclusion criterion apply
